bibl.title: Menander, The Bad-Tempered Man (Dyskolos).
bibl.seg: IRELAND Stanley (Edited with Translation, Introduction and Commentary by), Menander, The Bad-Tempered Man (Dyskolos).
Warminster, Aris and Phillips, 1995, 8°, iv-185 pp. ISBN 0-85668-610-7 (hbk) / 0-85668-225-X (pbk). £35 (hbk) / £11.95 (pbk).
C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 109 (1996) pp. 754-755. - Angela M. Heap, JHS 119 (1999) p. 184.
